name: Scratch The Adventure ULTRA demo version
name_original: Scratch The Adventure ULTRA demo version
description:
Dr.Horns has stolen the Power Orbs away from scratch's planet, and it's up to Scratch to find them!

(Note: This is the demo version of the game, the full verison is coming soon.)

Developer's notes:

There is one boss in the demo, with mechanics inspired by Pokemon.

The song used for the boss is not by me, but by it's respectful owners.

(Means that I don't know who owns the music.)

Victory music used belongs to Mega Man X developers.

Made using Scratch

Please note that the full version may be different from the demo.

The mechanics for the boss may seem boring, but in the full game, there will be different styles!

Have fun while I work on the full game!
